main: 1 corn cob, husk and silk removed

methods.Step 1: Preheat oven to 200°C. Place sweet potatoesUnsure of the quantity needed?Click on the underlined ingredient to reveal the quantity. No need to flip back and forth!OK, Got It (4 small gold sweet potatoes) on a baking tray. Bake, turning occasionally, for 40 mins or until tender.
methods.Step 2: Meanwhile, heat a chargrill on high. Cook corn (1 corn cob, husk and silk removed) on grill, turning, for 10 mins or until lightly charred and tender. Cool slightly. Use a serrated knife to cut down side of corn to release kernels.
methods.Step 3: Combine the black beans (400g can black beans, rinsed, drained) and salsa (300g jar Coles Tomato Salsa Mild) in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 mins or until heated through.
methods.Step 4: Use a sharp knife to cut a slit lengthways in top of each sweet potato (don’t cut all the way through). Gently squeeze base of each potato to open slightly. Use a fork to mash flesh slightly.
methods.Step 5: Spoon the bean mixture over each sweet potato. Top with cabbage (1 cup finely shredded red cabbage) and corn kernels. Sprinkle with coriander leaves (Coriander leaves, to serve). Serve with the avocado dip (Avocado dip, to serve).
